code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const TodoForm=_ref=>{let{addTodo}=_ref;const[value,setValue]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(value){addTodo(value);setValue("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"TodoForm",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"TodoInput",value:value,placeholder:"Today's Task?",onChange:e=>{setValue(e.target.value);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"Todo-btn",children:"Add task"})]});};export default TodoForm;
